ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They do. Verant does have tools. The players complain about the tools used. (Killing people that come in and attack. Teleporting away disruptive players
ygData.messageBody:
>Oh I totally agree. I don't think the events start out as stupid. I think
>the actions of the 40+'s that come in and destroy an event clearly
>far below
>their level make them stupid. I would have thought that Verant would have
>found a way around this by now. I can't imagine that the guides/gms don't
>complain about it every time they run one.

They do.
Verant does have tools.
The players complain about the tools used.

(Killing people that come in and attack.
Teleporting away disruptive players
Teleporting away -- and locking in a no-exit/no-teleport room
...are just a few)

Disruptive players find more ways to disrupt faster than Verant can find
ways to overcome.

And btw, you can't lock rooms to under level when its taking place in a
zone where 1) They have to travel through to get to other zones or 2) They
can fight stuff in for XP. That's not fair either.
